channel.title: (Class Suggestion) (NK) Warrior of Chaos (NI) Warrior of the Light
channel.description:
So it's like inq/sorc, if WoC appear, then WotL will appear too.
Warrior of Chaos (Neutral killer) Passive 1: Gifts of Chaos. Immune to occupation, conversation and target change. Death immune. Day ability 1: Seduce: Make target a sinner. 3 uses. Night ability 1: Blood for the Blood God! Attack target, if drunk tryed to debauch you or if butler tryed to occupy you, instead kill them. Night ability 2: Demonic rage: Attack target and everyone who visit then, this attack will bypass night immune. You will also attack everyone who visit you. 2 uses, 1 night cooldown, can only be used if warrior of the light is dead.
Warrior of the Light (Neutral investigative) Passive 1: Pure soul: Immune to occupation, conversation and target change. Death immune. Day ability 1: Lay on hands: Target will no longer be a sinner (if he was). If target was cult, then he will die tonight, this would not count as visiting and will bypass heal/immune/prevention (jail or merc protect) 2 uses. Night ability 1: Trial of the light. Check if your target is a sinner, (Sinners are: Anyone that killed someone who is not cult, cult, warrior of chaos, target of seduce) Night ability 2: Last trial. Attack the target if he is a sinner, this attack will bypass night immune, if target is not a sinner, you will kill youself. 3 uses.
So WotL need to kill WoC, while WoC need to kill all major factions.
(P.S. This idea might be bad and one more inq/sorc combo might be a bad idea too)

Passive 1: Gifts of Chaos. Immune to occupation, conversation and target change. Death immune.

Sorc has this now.

For_The_Jerusalem:

Day ability 1: Seduce: Make target a sinner. 3 uses.

Magic dust like before, where you had 3 magic dust instead of 2-2 magic cloaks-dust. Sinning = magic. But minor difference.

For_The_Jerusalem:

Night ability 1: Blood for the Blood God! Attack target, if drunk tryed to debauch you or if butler tryed to occupy you, instead kill them

Magic rocket

For_The_Jerusalem:

Night ability 2: Demonic rage: Attack target and everyone who visit then, this attack will bypass night immune. You will also attack everyone who visit you. 2 uses, 1 night cooldown, can only be used if warrior of the light is dead.

Sorc circle of death after the recent patch

For_The_Jerusalem:

Passive 1: Pure soul: Immune to occupation, conversation and target change. Death immune.

Well inquis isn’t occ immune or redirect so a small difference.

For_The_Jerusalem:

Day ability 1: Lay on hands: Target will no longer be a sinner (if he was). If target was cult, then he will die tonight, this would not count as visiting and will bypass heal/immune/prevention (jail or merc protect) 2 uses.

Anti-Magic dust, the cult killing should not happen if this is supposed to counter the NK.
